PHRASE.LANG: This “Lets hug it out” t-shirt invites all those around you to settle their differences the only way that makes sense. [#Legal]
Ce t-shirt “Lets hug it out” invite votre entourage à enterrer la hache de guerre de la seule manière sensée qui soit. [#Legal]
Dieses „Let's hug it out“-T-Shirt lädt alle um dich herum dazu ein, ihre Differenzen auf die einzig richtige Art zu lösen. [#Legal]
Questa t-shirt "Lets hug it out" invita tutti coloro che ti stanno attorno a risolvere le loro differenze nell'unico modo sensato. [#Legal]
Esta camiseta “Let's hug it out” invita a los demás a zanjar sus diferencias de la única manera razonable: con abrazos. [#Legal]
This “Lets hug it out” t-shirt invites all those around you to settle their differences the only way that makes sense. [#Legal]
